intro: I’m a <1>front-end developer</1> specializing in <3>Next.js</3> and <5>TypeScript</5>. Feel free to reach out via social media or at: <7>abdukhamidov0904@gmail.com</7>
title: Experience
point1: Creating responsive and interactive web apps (React, Next.js, TypeScript).
point2: Translating UI/UX designs into code and customizing for client needs.
point3: Building modern components using Tailwind CSS & Shadcn.
point4: Optimizing web pages for SEO and performance.
